an5.6:1.1: “Na tava, bhikkhave, akusalassa samapatti hoti yava saddha paccupatthita hoti kusalesu dhammesu.
an5.6:1.2: Yato ca kho, bhikkhave, saddha antarahita hoti, assaddhiyam pariyutthaya titthati;
an5.6:2.1: Na tava, bhikkhave, akusalassa samapatti hoti yava hiri paccupatthita hoti kusalesu dhammesu.
an5.6:2.2: Yato ca kho, bhikkhave, hiri antarahita hoti, ahirikam pariyutthaya titthati;
an5.6:3.1: Na tava, bhikkhave, akusalassa samapatti hoti yava ottappam paccupatthitam hoti kusalesu dhammesu.
an5.6:3.2: Yato ca kho, bhikkhave, ottappam antarahitam hoti, anottappam pariyutthaya titthati;
an5.6:4.1: Na tava, bhikkhave, akusalassa samapatti hoti yava viriyam paccupatthitam hoti kusalesu dhammesu.
an5.6:4.2: Yato ca kho, bhikkhave, viriyam antarahitam hoti, kosajjam pariyutthaya titthati;
an5.6:5.1: Na tava, bhikkhave, akusalassa samapatti hoti yava panna paccupatthita hoti kusalesu dhammesu.
an5.6:5.2: Yato ca kho, bhikkhave, panna antarahita hoti, duppanna pariyutthaya titthati;
